content: these socks use basic weaving patterns herringbone and polka dot these patterns look elaborate but actually are simple and easy to knit use your favorite combination colors ベーシックなツイードとドットを組み合わせた、ほんのりモードな雰囲気の編み込み靴下。全体的に凝って見えますが、柄自体は単調なため意外と編みやすく感じると思います。組み合わせる色によってガラリとイメージが変わるのも特徴です。 size woman s m leg circumference 21cm gauge 9 sts and 10 5 row = 1 2 5 cm in stranded knitting on us size 1 2 25 mm needles 9 5 sts and 11 5 row = 1 2 5 cm in stockinette stitch on us size 0 2 mm needles needles us size 0 2 00 mm and us size 1 2 25 mm circular needles or adjust size to obtain the correct gauge yarn & notions light fingering weight sock yarn the yarns shown in the photos are main color mc regia 4-fädig tweed #2 nature 75% wool 25% nylon 50g 220 yards 200 m contrasting color cc1 valley yarns charlemont kettle dye #black 40% wool 35% bluefaced leicester 25% nylon 50g 220 yards 200 m contrasting color cc2 opal 4 ply #2012 neon yellow 50g 220 yards 200 m if you want to make it larger or longer prepare more yarn stitch markers and a tapestry needle read about these socks on my blog 1 1 http //shinbashies blog71 fc2 com/blog-entry-669 html
